bios.bio:
👑 Rishabh | azinny.x
📍against the crowd
🖕 fake vibes only get blocked
bios.prompt: Lone figure walking against a moving crowd, bold and confident.
bios.caption: I don’t fit in. I stand out.

bios.bio:
🔥 I’m my own vibe
📍No one compares
🖤 Unapologetically me
bios.prompt: A figure standing on a rooftop, city lights glowing below, exuding confidence.
bios.caption: I don’t chase trends. I am the trend.

bios.bio:
🖕 society | 🔒 private soul
📍Earth, unfortunately
💭 I don't follow rules. I rewrite them.
bios.prompt: A dark, moody street at night with neon signs, one figure standing alone in a hoodie.
bios.caption: Born to stand alone. Rules are for followers.

bios.bio:
⚡ Born to disrupt
📍Vibes too loud
🖤 I own the chaos
bios.prompt: A figure in a leather jacket, standing under a stormy sky with lightning.
bios.caption: Chaos is my kingdom.

bios.bio:
not here to impress
📍lost in my own world
💀 built different
bios.prompt: A person staring through a rainy window, deep in thought, grayscale tone.
bios.caption: Not made to impress. Just made different.

bios.bio: 🧠 Overthinking. 💔 Trusting less. 🔥 Caring less.
bios.prompt: A person standing in a dark room, lost in deep thought.
bios.caption: The fewer people I trust, the less I care.

bios.bio:
💔 Heartbroken, but still standing
📍Waiting for peace, not love
⛓️ Trapped in my own thoughts
bios.prompt: A person sitting alone on a bench, with a somber expression.
bios.caption: A heart that's been broken, but never shattered.

bios.bio:
🌧️ Tears blend with rain
📍Lost in my silence
🖤 No one hears
bios.prompt: A figure standing under an umbrella in heavy rain, face hidden.
bios.caption: Some pain is silent, but it screams within.

bios.bio:
🖤 Fading into memories
📍Echoes of what was
💔 Heart in fragments
bios.prompt: A figure walking away in a foggy forest, silhouette barely visible.
bios.caption: Some losses leave scars that never heal.

bios.bio:
🖤 Emotions in turmoil
📍Eyes filled with memories
💭 Overthinking every moment
bios.prompt: A misty street at night with a figure looking down, holding their chest.
bios.caption: Not all scars are visible. Some are buried deep within.

bios.bio:
📍Living in my own sorrow
💭 Mind numb, heart cold
🖤 Dark thoughts, cold soul
bios.prompt: A lone figure walking through a foggy path, rain falling slowly.
bios.caption: Tears in my eyes, but none to show.

bios.bio:
💭 Searching for meaning in the void
📍Lost in time
🖤 No light, only shadows
bios.prompt: A shadowed room, a figure seated in contemplation.
bios.caption: Not broken, just lost in the void.

bios.bio:
🖤 Darkness is my comfort
📍Too deep to decode
💀 Cold soul, warm smile
bios.prompt: A person with an enigmatic smile, surrounded by darkness.
bios.caption: Comfort in the dark, warmth in my smile.

bios.bio:
🌑 I thrive in shadows
📍No one knows my truth
🖤 Secrets are my armor
bios.prompt: A figure cloaked in shadows, standing under a moonlit sky.
bios.caption: The dark hides my scars, but not my strength.

bios.bio:
🖤 I’m the whisper in the void
📍No light reaches me
💀 Fearless in the abyss
bios.prompt: A figure standing at the edge of a dark cliff, stars above.
bios.caption: I don’t fear the dark; I am the dark.

bios.bio:
🧠 Deep thoughts, dark truths
📍Invisible in real life
💀 Trust is a weapon
bios.prompt: A shadowy figure walking alone at night with deep, introspective thoughts.
bios.caption: What you see is never the whole truth.

bios.bio:
⛓️ Caught between dreams and nightmares
📍Living in the abyss
🖤 Alone in the darkness
bios.prompt: A lonely figure walking through a corridor with eerie shadows and glowing lights.
bios.caption: Between reality and nightmare, I walk alone.

bios.bio:
⚠️ Warning: I'm not what you expect
📍Broken but resilient
🖤 Dark soul, fiery spirit
bios.prompt: A person standing in front of a fire, staring into the distance.
bios.caption: Not everything broken is meant to be fixed.

bios.bio:
💣 Break through the noise
📍Against all odds
💪 Nothing stops me
bios.prompt: A silhouette climbing a steep mountain, against a backdrop of a rising sun.
bios.caption: Rise above, even when the world tries to pull you down.

bios.bio:
🌟 I’m my own spark
📍No limits, only goals
💥 Keep rising
bios.prompt: A figure standing on a cliff, arms raised, sunrise in the background.
bios.caption: The only limit is the one you set.

bios.bio:
⚡ Ignite your fire
📍Dream big, work hard
🔥 You are unstoppable
bios.prompt: A figure running through a field, with a fiery sunset behind.
bios.caption: Your dreams are worth the fight.

bios.bio:
🔥 Stay focused
📍No distractions
💯 Always moving forward
bios.prompt: A person sprinting through a rainy street, determination in their eyes.
bios.caption: Success is the result of relentless dedication.

bios.bio:
⚡ Lightning in my veins
📍No retreat, no surrender
💪 Be your own hero
bios.prompt: A figure standing under a lightning storm, fearless and powerful.
bios.caption: Don't wait for heroes. Be one.

bios.bio:
💥 The journey is the reward
📍Never look back
🔥 Keep pushing forward
bios.prompt: A person walking through the storm, but with determination in their eyes.
bios.caption: The only way is forward.

bios.bio:
🍕 I’m on a seafood diet.
📍I see food and I eat it.
bios.prompt: A person sitting at a table, devouring a pizza slice.
bios.caption: Eating is my cardio.

bios.bio:
😹 Wi-Fi weak, vibes strong
📍Error 404: Motivation not found
bios.prompt: A person laughing at their phone, surrounded by snacks.
bios.caption: Life’s too short to take seriously.

bios.bio:
🤡 Professional overthinker
📍Currently avoiding adulthood
😴 Naps are my superpower
bios.prompt: A person lounging on a couch, surrounded by empty coffee cups.
bios.caption: Why adult when you can nap?

bios.bio:
👑 Not a morning person
📍Will take naps instead of coffee
bios.prompt: A person in pajamas, yawning while sitting on a couch.
bios.caption: Morning? What’s that?

bios.bio:
🦄 I'm just a big kid in an adult body.
📍Still trying to find my way around adulthood.
bios.prompt: A person holding a toy, smiling mischievously.
bios.caption: Adulthood? Can’t do it.

bios.bio:
😴 Can’t talk right now
📍I'm busy sleeping.
bios.prompt: A person asleep at their desk, with coffee cups everywhere.
bios.caption: Sleep > Everything else.

bios.bio:
💖 Love without expectations
📍Hearts don't lie
🌙 We are forever
bios.prompt: A couple sitting under the stars, hand in hand.
bios.caption: You + me = eternity.

bios.bio:
💞 My heart beats for you
📍Lost in your eyes
🌹 Love is my truth
bios.prompt: A close-up of two hands intertwined, with a soft sunset glow.
bios.caption: With you, I’m whole.

bios.bio:
💕 You’re my safe haven
📍Love in every glance
🌟 Forever yours
bios.prompt: A couple embracing under a glowing lantern-lit tree.
bios.caption: In your arms, I’m home.

bios.bio:
💘 Waiting for the one who will understand
📍Love beyond words
bios.prompt: Two people sharing a quiet moment by a fire.
bios.caption: In silence, we speak the loudest.

bios.bio:
💌 Love isn't perfect, but it's worth it
📍I choose love every day
bios.prompt: A hand holding a red rose against a sunset backdrop.
bios.caption: True love is never perfect, but it is always worth it.

bios.bio:
💖 Heart full of love, soul full of peace
📍Together we shine
bios.prompt: A couple walking in sync, glowing under a full moon.
bios.caption: In your arms, I found home.

bios.bio:
🎨 Art is my therapy
📍Living in colors
🌈 My imagination knows no limits
bios.prompt: A person painting a vibrant mural on a brick wall.
bios.caption: When words fail, art speaks.

bios.bio:
✨ I create my own world
📍Dreams in every stroke
🖌️ Reality is my canvas
bios.prompt: A figure sketching under a starry sky, surrounded by glowing art.
bios.caption: My art, my universe.

bios.bio:
🖼️ Crafting stories in silence
📍Every moment is art
🌟 I’m the masterpiece
bios.prompt: A person arranging Polaroids on a wall, with soft lighting.
bios.caption: Life is my gallery.

bios.bio:
🖋️ Writing is my escape
📍Lost in stories
📚 Reality can wait
bios.prompt: A figure sitting in a cozy corner, surrounded by books.
bios.caption: In words, I find my freedom.

bios.bio:
🎶 Music runs through my veins
📍Beats are my heartbeat
🎧 Life is a song

bios.caption: When life gets loud, music is the melody.

bios.bio:
📷 Capturing moments
📍Memories in frames
🌟 Stories frozen in time

bios.bio:
🌸 Petals and dreams
📍Chasing soft sunsets
✨ Living in pastel hues

🌙 Moonlit vibes only
